author: sky.cactus
content: Does anyone know what PoW algorithm is most closely coupled with the cost of electricity (relative to cost of hardware)?

author: sky.cactus
content: Is it SHA256 just due to the massive amount of R&D that has gone into Bitcoin mining?  Is there perhaps a different algorithm that is "trivial" to make ASICs for such that the cost of hardware is relatively inconsequential compared to the cost of hardware?
